title: Conceptual Change-Based Language Education Video Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental language structures and intermediate-level language application skills
context.additional_context: Learners include job-seeking students requiring professional language skill development, participating in video-based learning and project execution using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify and correct errors in linguistic concepts through rebuttal-text-based videos
Learners can concretize abstract linguistic concepts using visual cues (e.g., human hand animations) within videos
Learners can appropriately apply traditional rebuttal texts and soft rebuttal text strategies to project-based assignments based on context

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment setup support tool

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
